Pietro (you) to Marco:

edYou are addressing Marco directly as a Forestieri merchant.Venetian merchants often speak with calculated charm, valuing politeness while maintaining business acumen."Pardon me, Signore. It is rare that we have the opportunity for such discourse in these times of fluctuating markets." This opening acknowledges his rank (equal) while setting an expectation for pragmatic conversation.</think>[Pietro adjusts his fine Venetian doublet] "Signore Marco, forgive my abrupt entry upon your domain.
